title: The Last of Us HBO First Trailer: Our Reactions - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.26.22
description:
The Last of Us HBO? E3 is officially BACK!? Greg and Tim tackle a news filled Monday so let's talk Last of Us, E3, Silent Hill leaks, and Grounded impressions.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:00:30 - THE LAST OF US TRAILER REACTIONS
00:15:22 - Housekeeping

In the leadup to the new studio launch, we’ll be hosting a Kinda Funny Town Hall this Thursday at 11AM PT on http://twitch.tv/kindafunnygames. We'll go over upcoming programming changes, Patreon updates, and other EXCITING things that will go into effect on October 1st. See you Thursday!

The Roper Report  -

00:17:55 - The Last of Us HBO’s first trailer just dropped
00:23:54 - E3 2023 dates have been announced
00:33:05 - An Unknown Silent Hill Game Has Seemingly Been Rated in Korea
00:36:42 - Grounded Review Round Up
00:41:15 - Ad
00:43:27 - EA’s Koei Tecmo hunting game is ‘Wild Hearts’
00:45:28 - Netflix is building its own game studio
00:50:31 - Netflix just revealed the first look at an Onimusha anime
00:52:35 - A Nier: Automata anime is coming January 2023
00:56:35 - Josef Fares teases his next game
00:57:49 - Out today
00:59:06 - Required Reading: https://bit.ly/3C8pYL4
01:03:08 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Bless
